Package positiveVariabilityManagement.fragmentManagement.classIntroduction

Class ClassIntroduction

java.lang.Object
positiveVariabilityManagement.fragmentManagement.classIntroduction.ClassIntroduction
public abstract class ClassIntroduction extends Object
Functionality to introduce class during evolution of positive variability -variables are moved, encapsulated and initialized in class -main function is transformed into constructor and other are connected to the class
Author:
Jakub Perdek
